text: Kim Jin-Kyu (born 16 February 1985) is a South Korean professional athlete. He is best known as an football player. He was a member of the Korean national team.National-Football-Teams.com, "Kim Jin-Kyu"; retrieved 2012-9-6. == Career statistics == ===Club=== Club performance Club performance Club performance League
